subject: Learning
title: Risky Play: Learning Through Daring
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Risky Play: Learning Through Daring.

hook.text: A child climbs a tree and feels terrified. They make it to the top. That experience teaches more than any classroom.

discovery.text: It builds risk assessment, resilience, and confidence. Kids who experience risky play develop fewer anxiety disorders.

twist.text: Overprotective environments that remove all risk can increase anxiety by stopping children from building coping skills.

climax.text: The goal isn't dangerâ€”it's age-appropriate challenges that stretch comfort zones under watchful eyes.

punchline.text: Children need safe-enough risk, not zero risk. Courage is built, not born.

quiz.question: How does risky play affect children's anxiety levels?
options: Children who experience risky play develop fewer anxiety disorders
